programme.title: Snow
programme.desc: In the heart of winter, several notables are found murdered. To advance investigations, Captain Delhaye decides to bring Juliette Hémon out of prison for a few days. The young woman had been imprisoned some years earlier for a strangely similar case.

programme.title: Manta Manta: Legacy
programme.desc: Ex-racer Bertie is facing financial issues with his car repair shop and go-kart track. He plans to participate in an upcoming 90’s race to solve his money problems, but he is suddenly asked by his ex-wife to take care of their son.

programme.title: Celeste
programme.desc: Living in the lush rainforest of Northern Queensland, a retired opera diva prepares for one final performance. Her late husband's son Jack arrives, haunted by the past, only to discover that Celeste has one last request for him.

programme.title: Abu Omar
programme.desc: Under a strict military curfew Salah, a grieving father, sets out on the road to cross the Israeli border carrying his dead son Omar in a duffel bag. Miri, a pregnant single woman, decides to help him out at all costs while fending off the terrible heat.

programme.title: Running On Sand
programme.desc: When an Eritrean refugee about to be deported from Israel is mistaken for the Nigerian striker just signed to a struggling soccer team, his fate depends on the team’s success in this charming, socially relevant dramedy.

programme.title: Golden Men
programme.desc: Based on a true story. A star-studded heist film with a comedic edge, Golden Men follows a group of desperate men in Turin who attempt an armoured truck robbery.

programme.title: Mountain Woman
programme.desc: When famine overruns a small Japanese village, Rin must leave the village in order to protect her father accused of theft. Rin heads deep into Mt. Hayachin, and crosses the forbidden mountain god's shrine, where the goddess of thieves is said to dwell.

programme.title: East Frisian: Moor
programme.desc: Frank Weller's perfect proposal plans are derailed as he and Inspector Ann Kathrin Klaasen delve into a gruesome case. The couple must solve a case involving a poorly concealed body in Uplengen Moor and a kidnapping of twins in the city center.

programme.title: The Devil Inside
programme.desc: Catherine is the head of a parole agency, a wife and a mother. When a 20-years-old charismatic inmate is released on parole, she finds herself ensnared in a sordid affair with him. Their unbridled passion unleashes dangerous consequences for both.

programme.title: Ka Benjie
programme.desc: The quiet life of the dreamer Ka Benjie was shattered when he heard of the enrollment in the other village.

programme.title: Ricky
programme.desc: When Katie, an ordinary woman, meets Paco, an ordinary man, something magical and miraculous happens: a love story. From this union will be born an extraordinary baby: Ricky.

programme.title: A Far Shore
programme.desc: Seventeen-year-old Aoi is an underage mother struggling to make ends meet and dealing with her husband’s violent temper. After her husband loses his job, their continuous fights lead them to a social downfall.

programme.title: Sweet Dreams
programme.desc: Dutch tycoon Jan dies suddenly in Indonesia, leaving his wife Agathe in shock. Their son and his pregnant wife come from the Netherlands to inherit the family empire and are dismayed to find out that Jan's mistress Siti has a crucial role in his will.

programme.title: 180 Degree Rule
programme.desc: Sara, a schoolteacher from Tehran, is preparing to attend a wedding in northern Iran with her family. When her husband suddenly forbids her from going, she hatches a plan to go in secret. But her choice soon places her on a painful path to atonement.
